chunk:
Alder New York Everyday Face Serum

Brand: Alder New York

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Niacinamide (vitamin B3), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, Willow bark extract*, Glycerin*, Panthenol (vitamin B5), Sodium hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl glycol

Directions: Apply 1-2 pumps of product to your fingertips

t to your fingertips. Then apply to your dry or damp freshly cleaned face in a gentle patting motion. Use 1-2 times daily for best results.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
